tasks.coref.spl

Class SPLCoreferencePipelineWithMetaMapAnnotations

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.spl.SPLCoreferencePipelineWithMetaMapAnnotations

  • public class SPLCoreferencePipelineWithMetaMapAnnotations
extends java.lang.Object
    The coreference resolution pipeline for SPL drug coreference dataset, that uses entities extracted by MetaMap as input. It can use the resolution strategies that were optimized for gold entities or the strategies that were optimized for MetaMap output.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • loadBestStrategies

        public static java.util.List<Strategy> loadBestStrategies()
        Loads the resolution strategies that yield the best results on entities generated by MetaMap.
        Returns:
        the list of resolution strategies.

      • writeStandoffAnnotations

        public static void writeStandoffAnnotations(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>> writeTypes,
                                            java.lang.String outFileName,
                                            Document doc)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Writes relevant semantic objects as standoff annotations to an output file. Differently from other similar methods, it prints out concept information generated by MetaMap, as well.
        Parameters:
        writeTypes - the semantic object types to write
        outFileName - the output file to write to
        doc - the document that contains the semantic objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if outFileName cannot be opened

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads properties from properties file and initializes WordNet, section segmenter, and coreference-related word lists. It also selects the resolution strategies to use and loads them.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the section segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the section segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the section segmenter cannot be initialized
        java.io.IOException - if properties file cannot be found

      • main

                 throws java.io.IOException,

                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
